description: The 23-year-old was spotting dining on french fries in Miami on Tuesday. Last week, the reality star underwent plastic surgery, including a reported Brazilian butt lift, a tummy tuck and breast implants.
title: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry pictured enjoying french fries in Miami
title_page: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry pictured enjoying french fries in Miami | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kailyn Lowry may have undergone plastic surgery last week, but nothing is stopping her from enjoying a delicious meal.
The 23-year-old was spotted dining on french fries and a large blended drink on Tuesday in Miami Beach while casually dressed in leggings and a T-shirt.
The reality star is reportedly recovering from a discounted 'Brazilian Butt Lift' with a tummy tuck and breast implants by surgeon Dr. Michael Salzhauer.
Scroll down for video
Delicious: The 23-year-old was spotted dining on french fries and a large blended drink on Tuesday in Miami Beach while casually dressed in leggings and a t-shirt
The Teen Mom 2 star enjoyed her meal while wearing a colorful sports bra and cropped black leggings.
The mother of two added embellished sandals and a small red wallet for her lunch outing, showing off her tattoo sleeve.
Kailyn sported a makeup free face and opted to pull her ombre locks back into a high bun with a brown headband.
Last week, the reality star took to Twitter to clear up a rumor that she got a silicone-enhanced behind, writing: 'I did not get butt implants.'
Snack time: The reality star is reportedly recovering from a discounted 'Brazilian Butt Lift' with a tummy tuck and breast implants by surgeon Dr. Michael Salzhauer
She showed off her sculpted derriere and hips in her skintight spandex while heading out of the establishment.
The first photos of her plastic surgery appeared on TMZ, which showed the starlet on an operating table before and after her procedures.
Kailyn is mom to six-year-old son Isaac with ex-boyfriend Joe Rivera and two-year-old son Lincoln with her husband, Javi Marroquin.
On the go: The Teen Mom 2 star dined on her meal while wearing a colorful sports bra, a loose t-shirt and cropped black leggings
Javi defended her decision on Twitter last week, writing: 'Whatever is going to make her happy then I ride with her. Feel better babe @KailLowry.
She shared a photo while posing with Dr.Salzhauer to her 2.1 million Instagram followers on Tuesday, writing: 'Dr. Miami y'all! @therealdrmiami @drmiamiland.'
The makeup free TV star smiled wide while dressed in a Victoria's Secret Pink shirt with her hair in a casual braid.
Kailyn recently added author to her resume after her children's novel, Love Is Bubbleglum, was released in November.
Teen Mom 2 was also recently renewed for a seventh season and is set to return to small screens this year.
All smiles: She shared a photo while posing with Dr.Salzhauer to her 2.1 million Instagram followers on Tuesday, writing: 'Dr. Miami y'all! @therealdrmiami @drmiamiland'
Mom life: Kailyn is mom to six-year-old son Isaac with ex-boyfriend Joe Rivera and two-year-old son Lincoln with her husband, Javi Marroquin
